DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and effectiveness of a high dose of ABT-378/ritonavir
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Two Different Doses of ABT-378/Ritonavir in HIV-Infected Patients Who Have Taken Protease Inhibitors and Non-Nucleoside Reverse Transcriptase Inhibitors
DOC.criteria: Inclusion: HIV positive Are at least 18 years old Subject has not been treated for an active AIDSdefining opportunistic infection within 15 days of screening HIV RNA level > 1000 copies/mL Previous therapy with at least one protease inhibitor, at least one nonnucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor and at least one nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor Exclusion: Subject is pregnant or breastfeeding Subject has received an investigational drug within 30 days prior to screening Have a history of pancreatitis History of intolerance to ritonavir Abnormal laboratory tests at screening
